channel.title: python on Ernest Dong
channel.description: Recent content in python on Ernest Dong

item.title: python and mathematics
item.description: Get Start Concentrate on python and math 1 (pyvenv-activate "~/Code/thesis/.venv/") 1 2 3 4 5 6 import pandas as pd import numpy as np import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import seaborn as sns import statsmodels.api as sm import statsmodels.formula.api as smf numpy numpy 是底层为 C 的向量计算库，是 python 科学计算的基石，快速、贴近底
